transforms.name: vite:vue
vite:css
transforms.result: .fireworks-container{height:100%;left:0;pointer-events:none;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;z-index:1}.launching-page{background-color:#000;overflow:hidden;position:relative}.gradient-bottom{animation:fadeInGradient 2.5s forwards,expandGradient 2.5s forwards;background:linear-gradient(0deg,gold 0,#000);height:100px;left:0;opacity:0;transform:scaleY(0);transform-origin:bottom;width:100%}.curtain,.gradient-bottom{bottom:0;position:absolute}.curtain{background-color:#e50914;background-image:linear-gradient(90deg,rgba(229,9,20,.9),rgba(200,0,0,.7) 50%,rgba(229,9,20,.9));background-size:15px;box-shadow:inset -10px 0 15px rgba(0,0,0,.5),inset 10px 0 15px rgba(0,0,0,.5);top:0;transition:width 2.5s ease-in-out;width:50%;z-index:10}.curtain-left{left:0}.curtain-right{right:0}.open.curtain-left,.open.curtain-right{width:0}.content{transition:opacity 3s ease-in-out;z-index:5}.opacity-0{opacity:0}.opacity-1{opacity:1}.logo-popup{animation:popInLogo 2.5s forwards,blinkText 1s infinite;animation-delay:2s;height:160px}.bg-popup,.logo-popup{opacity:0;transform:scale(0);width:auto}.bg-popup{animation:popInLogo 2.5s forwards,blink 1s infinite;animation-delay:2s;height:200px}.welcome-text{animation:popInText 2s forwards,blinkText 1s infinite;animation-delay:3s;opacity:0}.enter-btn{animation:popInButton 2.5s forwards,blinkText 1s infinite;animation-delay:3.5s;opacity:0}@keyframes fadeInGradient{0%{opacity:0;transform:scaleY(0)}to{opacity:1;transform:scaleY(1)}}@keyframes expandGradient{0%{height:0}to{height:80px}}@keyframes blinkText{0%,to{text-shadow:0 0 15px rgba(255,215,0,.8),0 0 30px rgba(255,215,0,.6)}50%{text-shadow:0 0 30px gold,0 0 50px rgba(255,215,0,.8)}}@keyframes blinkImage{0%,to{box-shadow:0 0 10px hsla(0,0%,100%,.8)}50%{box-shadow:0 0 20px #fff}}@keyframes popInLogo{0%{opacity:0;transform:scale(0)}to{opacity:1;transform:scale(1)}}@keyframes popInText{0%{opacity:0;transform:scale(0)}to{opacity:1;transform:scale(1)}}@keyframes popInButton{0%{opacity:0;transform:scale(0)}to{opacity:1;transform:scale(1)}}
